attributes.action: Ban flights into the UK from Coronavirus Hotspots until the danger has passed.
attributes.additional_details: It is madness to let potentially infected people into the general population in the uk potentially making a bad situation worse.
attributes.background: Ban all flights or if not then provide testing for all incoming passengers and place passengers from Coronavirus Hotspots such  as Spain, Italy, Iran and the USA into quarantine centres for 14 days.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
